content: अद्वैत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] {@--1@} Not dual; of one or uniform nature, equable, unchanging; °तं सुखदुःखयोः <ls>U. 1. 39.</ls> {@--2@} Matchless, peerless, sole, only, unique. --तं [न. त.] {@--1@} Non-duality, identity; especially that of Brahma with the universe or with the soul, or of soul and matter; See अद्वय also. {@--2@} The supreme or highest truth or Brahma itself. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of an Upanishad; अद्वैतेन solely, without any duplicity.
